sentence: The actual beach area at the hotel is very nice but small
During our stay there was some construction going on but honestly i did not feel disturbed maybe because i did not spend too much time around that area and on the beach in general
Given that it was winter we did not spend a lot of time on the beach but it seemed nice
The construction project out at sea and shoring up of rocks did attract our attention but was never really an issue
Word of advice in most resorts along Dubais beaches access is simply handled by security who are sufficiently organized that they know who is a guest and who is not
Unfortunately there is not a complete sea view
Although hotel is on the beach view was that of a construction site
The beach is the only thing I did not like it is full of grass and there are some construction happening nearby that you ca nt enjoy the whole thing

Lifts far from some romsPol staff keep asking for room number and name for every single drink you order Sea view is looking at cranes in the distance not beautiful Dubai constantly growingNo GHD straighteners in the spa No make up table dresing table in room
The beach area is limited
This one is no different it is luxurious beyond belief and the location on Jumeirah Beach is outstanding
Luxurious Break at Four Seasons Dubai at Jumeirah Beach
let me tell you why I do Private beach Sun Sea Good food De stress

Effectively the only thing one could potetnialy complain is the Beach it is good and very private with fantastic service and super attentive staff BUT the territory itself is pretty small you can see the road in proximity or new residential blocks just close by on the right or some construction on the left
It does not matter what you feel like having in the morning you will find it there Great pool beach area to sunbathe while having amazing drinks or rent a cabana to take a nap
The place looks like a beach resort
I have been to a lot of hotels but I think this is the best place so far the rooms and the pool and beach area are amazing
Having stayed at several luxury hotels in Dubai I can confidently say that the Four Seasons in Jumeirah Beach is the top luxury resort in Dubai
While the beach is white sand and comfy chairs it misses the open sea view
Dinner at Sea Fu was exceptional but it was really the great service and attention from the staff
Four season at Jumeriah beach is ideal for relax in a warm place during Christmas
The hotel is very spacious with extremely nice and well kept gardens and has its own private sandy beach
The hotel has two Pools one with and one without kids both equally great
Large rooms of course sea view is nicer and much more expensive only necessary for extended stays and room stayer
Also next door the new Beach Club Namos of Mykonos
Food options are endless with top dining such as Nusrt and etc sitting area outside by the beach also is amazing beautiful gym and super service and friendly staff
Great location lots of dining options clean beach and super service

As I like leaving honest advises I have to admit that the food at the resort is good especially the Folia vegan dishes that are very delicate and tasteful the Indian food and naan bread and the breakfast at SUQ the Black Cod at Sea Fu and the moutabel and hot chocolate at Shai
Had visited Sea Fu restaurant amazing food
Great Beach views
